mapper.select: SELECT ew.event_comment_key eventCommentkey , ec.customer_id customerId , ec.event_comment_content eventCommentContent , ec.schedule_key scheduleKey , ec.event_key eventKey , c.customer_name customerName , c.customer_email customerEmail , e.event_title eventTitle FROM event_winner ew INNER JOIN event_comment ec ON ew.event_comment_key = ec.event_comment_key INNER JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = ec.customer_id INNER JOIN event e ON e.event_key = ec.event_key WHERE ec.event_key = #{eventKey}
SELECT schedule_key scheduleKey , movie_key movieKey , screenroom_key screenroomKey , start_date startDate , end_date endDate , preview FROM screening_schedule WHERE movie_key = #{movieKey}
SELECT movie_key movieKey , movie_title movieTitle FROM movie

SELECT event_key eventKey , event_title eventTitle , event_content eventContent , event_start_date eventStartDate , event_end_date eventEndDate , movie_key movieKey FROM event WHERE event_end_date < CURRENT_DATE() AND event_key NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT event_key FROM event_winner)
